location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to The Imam of Muscat

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has two different foliation sequences. The first is part of an original foliation sequence which was applied to the whole volume. It is written in ink and appears at the top right corner of the (verso) page. The second foliation number is a small pencil number enclosed in a circle which also appears in the top right (recto) corner only, this is the foliation number that has been used in referencing this item.Condition: The item has suffered from insect damage and a small part of the text is missing.

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the Imam's differences with Bussorah [Basra] and Stannus's recommendation against offensive measures.
